The repo for auth service on Greenstand


# How to use curl to test auth/token

```
curl -k -X POST \
  https://treetracker.local/auth/realms/treetracker/protocol/openid-connect/token \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
  -H 'authorization: Basic bWljcm9zZXJ2aWNlOmZCZHFKalEwS1R0RERtZlZaQkp5ampuNkZNWWhLcVF0' \
  -d 'grant_type=urn%3Aietf%3Aparams%3Aoauth%3Agrant-type%3Auma-ticket&audience=microservice&response_mode=permissions&subject_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJwR1N6SEJ4R1VCSU56Q1lwNEhXNTVVNTR3cVNQZWd2SGdCZjNjaFVQa2c0In0..KqtUQtz1HZntwaxo1asiQL0cmpsC4tobFfIl_FmIz8IULUSBoQgFnLQyT_VyVDV1nVpnzvA6R1u5Oh5KE11Jzum8mTQCPcaxhm-GdC9BcXAbeqJBkH7XCeIGXcGmlVAoC32Tp0gIGgeL6E85RocsLNdd4-PcXMRsW_FJONO8gq9C4kfRW6-8yL67fcSixq8h7xEYmyWI3q_VcYD_EVkYNvDjMG8UYWjI21ALjb5cPqWMplTLOgFlE4z2my23TkobX3D0Tfg-LQfNMRF1_pSuneaTY3gbl7TURV5QVVC8yonq5YbFsFqmZzX3k0baJ3gJLFPhbcneCiABc9NqRLGizw&permission=web-map-settings%23view'
```

It should respond like this:
```
[{"scopes":["view"],"rsid":"ba559d89-e0f4-4a35-adfa-a5c3ca29c56c","rsname":"web-map-settings"}]%                   
```
